1.SceneDescription: Monica, Chandler, and Phoebe's, Phoebe is at the sink and Chandler is lookingNEWLINEat a ring brochure.

lines.Line: Pheebs, can you help me pick out an engagement ring for Monica? INEWLINEcan’t figure this out! It’s so hard! Should I get her a (turning to each page)NEWLINETiffany cut or a Princess cut or a—ah-ah! Paper cut

Well, it’s because I trust you, you’re one of my bestNEWLINEfriends, and you walked in on me when I was looking at ring brochures
Yeah well, once again not knocking pays off. I only wish you hadn’tNEWLINEbeen on the toilet

lines.Character: (Joey and Ross enter causing Chandler to quickly hide the brochure behind his back

lines.Character: (Joey returns with a piece of pizza as Chandler and Phoebe exit
lines.Line: Joey returns with a piece of pizza as Chandler and Phoebe exit.

2.SceneDescription: Joey and Rachel's, Paul and Rachel are getting ready to go out. Paul isNEWLINEentering from the bathroom.

lines.Line: Honey I made a reservation at China Garden, is that okay
Yeah that’s great. But first, wait, talk to me, talk to me. Tell meNEWLINEabout your day
Okay. Hey, what are you thinking? What are you thinking right now
I’m thinking that you are looking really fine it that dress
I’m thinking that you are looking really fine it that dress

Yeah that’s great Paul, but y’know I wanna knowNEWLINEwhat—(Puts her hands on his shoulders)—Wow, those are really great! I just wannaNEWLINEknow what, what is behind this-this strong, silent exterior. Y’know they say thatNEWLINEstill waters run deep and I wanna swim in yours
Are you talking about having sex
Are you talking about having sex
No Paul, I don’t know anything about you! Y’know, like-likeNEWLINEyour childhood! Tell me about your childhood

Okay, well then how about puberty! Come on, that’s always a painfulNEWLINEtime! Y’know your friends invite you to a slumber party and then they stick your handNEWLINEin warm water while you’re sleeping so that you pee in your sleeping bag
Nope! That never happened to me
Nope! That never happened to me
Well, you’re lucky you never met that bitch Sharon Majesky. Anyway,NEWLINEumm… The rest of you life, y’know? Any regrets
All right Paul, I’m not asking for a lot here. Okay? Just give meNEWLINEsomething. Anything
When I was six years old
When I was six years old
I wanted a big wheel. And instead my parents got me this little plasticNEWLINEchicken that you hop around on. It was embarrassing; kids made fun of me. That was aNEWLINEpretty tough year
That’s-that’s great! See? I already feel like I know you aNEWLINElittle better! Thank you. Okay, come on. Now we can go eat. Let’s go. (Gets up toNEWLINEleave, but Paul doesn’t move.
It was horrible. They called me chicken boy
It was horrible. They called me chicken boy

lines.Character: [Time Lapse, Paul is now weeping uncontrollably in Rachel’s arms
lines.Line: Time Lapse, Paul is now weeping uncontrollably in Rachel’s arms.

And in fifth grade I got into a fight. Well, it wasn’t really aNEWLINEfight. Richard Darinvel bit me on the nose and, and I feel down. I still have a littleNEWLINEscare right here (points to it) you can see it

Yeah. Yeah, I-I-I see the scare. Listen, Paul, I think this is reallyNEWLINEgreat that-that y’know, you shared your feelings. It’s really, it’sNEWLINEbeautiful, but umm, what do you say we go share some food
What?! Wait! What are you talking about?! You love their Kung PaoNEWLINEChicken
My God, I’m sorry! I’m sorry! I didn’t mean to do that! INEWLINEwouldn’t do that

3.SceneDescription: Central Perk, Ross and Joey are there.

lines.Line: Hey, remember how Chandler and Phoebe blew us off yesterday
Okay. Well, apparently Chandler’s angry at us for not getting him aNEWLINEticket to that Knicks game a couple of weeks ago
Oh, we’re supposed to just get him a ticket?! That guy is alwaysNEWLINEmooching off of us
Yeah! Anyway, I-I still think we should try to patch things up,NEWLINEy’know? Like uh, maybe we could get him to get tickets to another Knicks game andNEWLINEinvite him
Oh wow that’s a great idea! And I still have his credit card
Oh wow that’s a great idea! And I still have his credit card
(handing them the bill) Here you go
(handing them the bill) Here you go
(handing them the bill) Here you go

Hey-hey-hey-ho-ho, I got this one. Here you go. (Hands GuntherNEWLINEChandler’s card.) Y’know I gotta tell ya, sometimes I just—I don’t getNEWLINEChandler. Y’know, me and him do stuff all the time without you and you don’t getNEWLINEall upset

4.SceneDescription: The Jewelry Store, Phoebe is busy trying on virtually everything in the store.NEWLINEShe’s got earrings, rings, bracelets, and enough necklaces to put Mr. T to shame on.

lines.Line: Okay umm, I’d also like to try on the tiara. (The male jewelerNEWLINEhands it to her.) Oh yeah. Okay. (Puts it on.) (To the jeweler) What do you think, tooNEWLINEmuch

Okay. Then, take the tiara back and let me hold the musket again. (HeNEWLINEhands it to her and Phoebe poses in front of one of those small mirrors.) Something’sNEWLINEmissing. It’s not… Okay oh, let me see the ring my friend picked out
(to the female jeweler) Where’s the 1920s princess cut ring
I just sold it to that gentleman. (Points to the one walking outNEWLINEthe store.
I just sold it to that gentleman. (Points to the one walking outNEWLINEthe store.

Oh my God!! (She runs after him, but sets of the security system, whichNEWLINElocks the store’s door and brings down a set of bars behind her, caging her in.) No!NEWLINEWhat?! Help me! Let me out! Now! (Points the musket at them.

5.SceneDescription: The Jewelry Store, Chandler is entering with his credit card and Phoebe isNEWLINEholding out another ring for him.

lines.Line: Chandler, I found the perfect ring. (Holding it out for her.
Oh, that’s uh, that’s pretty nice but I’m gonna go withNEWLINEthe one I picked first
Oh my God Chandler, the one you picked is gone. It’s over
Oh my God Chandler, the one you picked is gone. It’s over
Some guy bought it. I’m sorry. I tired to stop it but they (pointsNEWLINEto the jeweler) put me in jail
The little jail between the doors
Phoebe, I asked you to guard the ring
Phoebe, I asked you to guard the ring
I know, I’m sorry! But y’know, this ring is better! MonicaNEWLINEnever even saw the other ring
Yeah but when he proposed to me with the ring I got goose bumps
Yeah but when he proposed to me with the ring I got goose bumps

6.SceneDescription: Joey and Rachel's, Paul is writing something as Rachel enters.

lines.Line: Hey! I have so much more to tell ya, I’ve written it all down
Ah that’s great. No actually that’s… (In a sexy voice)NEWLINEThat’s great! That’s really great! Y’know, I gotta tell ya writing, I meanNEWLINEwriting, gets me uh, gets me kinda hot
Wait! Wait! Listen! Listen to this! (Flips a couple pages and points toNEWLINEsomething.) Y’know what I wanted to be when I was that age
I wanted to be one with the waves, y’know

Okay, hold on real quick, hold on a second let me just uh, (sits on theNEWLINEcounter and buttons her sweater to show some cleavage) get a little more comfortable here.NEWLINEWait, now wait a second, this isn’t too revealing is it
(barely glancing at her) No. What ever happened to that little dude.NEWLINE(Pause) So full of dreams

I don’t care about the little dude! I can’t! I cannot listenNEWLINEto anymore of this! Y’know, the only person who would want to listen to this is aNEWLINEmental health professional! And then it’s only because they get paid $100 an hour! DoNEWLINEyou know how much money I could’ve made listening to you? $2,000! And do you knowNEWLINEwhen I figured that out? While you were talking
What?! I can’t believe you’re trying to stifle me! When just 14NEWLINEhours ago we figured out that that is exactly what my mother was trying to do to me
Oh… I’m sorry. I… I-I don’t mean—I didn’tNEWLINEmean to stifle you. I… This is all just a little overwhelming
Oh… I’m sorry. I… I-I don’t mean—I didn’tNEWLINEmean to stifle you. I… This is all just a little overwhelming
Oh Rachel, I’m so sorry. I didn’t mean to overwhelm you.NEWLINEIt’s just that, when those gates open, you… (Starts to breakdown.) Hard to closeNEWLINE‘em. But they are closed now. Believe me
I’m so glad, I’m so glad you shared. (Feeling his shoulder.)NEWLINEAnd I’m glad that you’re done. What do you say we umm… (Nods in theNEWLINEdirection of the bedroom.
I would really like that. (They kiss.
I would really like that. (They kiss.
I would really like that. (They kiss.
I would really like that. (They kiss.

7.SceneDescription: Monica, Chandler, and Phoebe's, Chandler is looking at the ring he bought andNEWLINEnot liking it.

lines.Line: I can’t believe I let you talk me into buying this stupid gumballNEWLINEmachine looking ring
It’s not a stupid gumball machine looking ring! It’s aNEWLINEbeautiful ring

No, it’s not! When I looked at the other ring I could seeNEWLINEMonica’s face when I gave it to her, y’know? And I could see her saying yes.NEWLINEWhen I look at this ring, all I see is a ring! Unless I look at it really closely and thenNEWLINEI can see my own eye. (Does so and laughs.) Look, this is the most important thingNEWLINEI’m gonna do in my life. I wanna make sure it’s perfect
Okay. There may be a way that we can get the other ring back.NEWLINE‘Cause I heard the guy tell the jeweler where he was going to propose. So maybe weNEWLINEcan get him to trade rings or something
Well you certainly can’t give her that stupid gumball ring

8.SceneDescription: Joey and Rachel's, Joey and Ross are watching TV as Chandler enters.

lines.Line: Guys? (They ignore him.) I’ve got something important to tell ya.NEWLINE(Still nothing so he walks over and stands in front of the TV.) Guys? (They lean over toNEWLINEtry and watch the TV, Chandler mimics them.) Guys?! (Pause) I’m gonna ask Monica toNEWLINEmarry me
(To Ross) I think we gotta end the freeze out
Wait a minute, is this, is this for real
Wait a minute, is this, is this for real
Yeah, check out the ring. (Shows it to them.
Yeah, check out the ring. (Shows it to them.
So you two are really serious?
You-you’re gonna get married?! I mean… We’re gonna beNEWLINEbrothers-in-law! (They hug.
And-and-and-and-and-and, and we’re gonna be friends again!
And-and-and-and-and-and, and we’re gonna be friends again!
(goes to hug him and stops short) Heyyyy—What
Oh it’s water under the bridge, forget it
Oh it’s water under the bridge, forget it
Okay! (They hug.) I was gonna wait ‘til uh, it was officialNEWLINEy’know? But I got so excited I just had to tell you guys because you’re my bestNEWLINEfriends
(who has just entered) Ugh! No more crying! Please! I just dumped oneNEWLINEcry baby, I’ll dump you too
